page.title: 11 KINGSWEAR CHURCH
page.content:
Kingswear church is surrouunded by houses and the church is on the side of the hill. It has a small cemetery. The church was built in 1170 They think that before the church was built there was a chapel there. There are two Naves in the church and a tower. There is a clock and a belfry with three bells. The belfry used to have four bells but they sold one to pay for a clock. It was sold in 1767. The clock was given to the church in 1900 it cost Â£124.The organ which replaces an old one at the west end of the church was erected in 1916. It was restored in 1959 at a cost of Â£500.
{ Emma Southern,
